section.title: #xubuntu-devel
section.para: The IRC channel #xubuntu-devel is where most of the daily communication and cooperation about Xubuntu development happens. It's also the place to get to know people and get yourself known.

section.title: The status tracker
section.para: The Xubuntu status tracker is where the development progress for the current development cycle is tracked and located at tracker.xubuntu.org.
